text: TNT ’ s The Last Ship has halted production as series lead Eric Dane battles depression. RELATEDThe Last Ship Enlists Melrose Place Vet Thomas Calabro for 2018 Season In a statement released to our sister site Variety, a rep for the Last Ship lead / Grey ’ s Anatomy alum confirms that he requested “ a break to deal with personal issues, ” forcing the show to hit pause on production through Memorial Day. “ [ Eric ] suffers from depression, ” the statement continues, “ and has asked for a few weeks of downtime, and the producers kindly granted that request. He looks forward to returning. ” The Last Ship, which has already been renewed through Season 5, is currently in the midst of shooting its fourth and fifth seasons back - to - back.
